io.github.olyutorskii.jarabradix

Class DecimalSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.olyutorskii.jarabradix.DecimalSequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence

    public class DecimalSequence
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.CharSequence
    Decimal character sequence with CharSequence API.

    Arabic digit characters holder. (with leading minus-sign if negative)

    int and long value input supported.

    See Also:
    Integer.toString(int), Long.toString(long)
